price: 122 Son Seigneur l’a ensuite élu, acceptant son repentir et le remettant sur le droit chemin.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: thumma ij'tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba ʿalayhi wahadā
